molecular.io.read_pdb¶

molecular.io.read_pdb(fname, backend='pandas')[source]¶

Read PDB file and return Trajectory

PDB format can be described in depth at http://www.wwpdb.org/documentation/file-format.

Parameters

  • fname (str) – Name of PDB file to be read

  • backend (str) – (Default: ‘pandas’)

  • skip (int) – (Optional) Read every skip frames.

Returns

Trajectory of PDB

Return type

molecular.Trajectory

Previous topic

molecular.io.read_dcd

Next topic

molecular.io.read_table
